com.motorola.mod

Class ModDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.motorola.mod.ModDisplay

  • public abstract class ModDisplay
extends Object
    The ModDisplay class includes the functionality to control a Display class device on a Moto Mod.

    You do not instantiate this class directly; instead, retrieve it through ModManager.getClassManager(device, ModDisplay.class).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACTION_DISPLAY_OFF
      Broadcast action: sent when the external display on the Moto Mod is turned off.
      static String ACTION_DISPLAY_ON
      Broadcast action which will be sent when the external display on the Moto Mod is turned on.
      static int STATE_OFF
      The Moto Mod Display state is OFF
      static int STATE_ON
      The Moto Mod Display state is ON
      static int STATE_UNKNOWN
      The Moto Mod Display state is UNKNOWN

    • Method Detail

      • setModDisplayState

        public abstract boolean setModDisplayState(int state)
        Sets the state of the Moto Mod display.
        Parameters:
        state - Must be one of ModDisplay.STATE_OFF, ModDisplay.STATE_ON.
        Returns:
        True - success, false - failed.

      • getModDisplayState

        public abstract int getModDisplayState()
        Gets the state of the Moto Mod display.
        Returns:
        One of ModDisplay.STATE_OFF, ModDisplay.STATE_ON or ModDisplay.STATE_UNKNOWN.
